title: Buona
body: Buona caffettiera, comunque del caffè passa attraverso il filtro e lascia del fondo nella tazzina. A volte un po' complicato pressare il caffé che tende a fare un tappo che oppone resistenza mentre si spinge il filtro verso il basso.

title: コスパ高い
body:
比較的安い商品でしたが、実用性は十分でした。

作りも悪くなく、長く使えそうです。金具などに金メッキがかかってるような商品も多いですが、すぐハゲて貧乏臭くなりますからね。

メッシュの部分も網目が細か過ぎず荒過ぎず、ちょうど良い感じでした。細かすぎるとコーヒーの粒子が引っかかって押し下げに力が必要だったり、網目の洗浄が面倒になりますが、ズボラな私には良い感じでした。コスパの良い実用的な商品かと思います。

title: 豆そのままが味わえる
body: 800mlと350mlとほとんど価格差が無かったので800mlを購入。結構粗挽きの豆を使ったのだが、どうしても細かい豆が入ってしまい、コーピーカップの中がジャリジャリする。まぁ、構造上の宿命だけど。避けたければカップに注ぐ時にペーパーフィルター等を通すしか無い。まぁ、ステンレス製のノーペーパードリッパーの方がお勧めか。味はドリップに比較して結構マイルドになり、飲みやすい。スプーンはすり切りでほぼ7gで提案通り。ここには４分後にプランジャーを押し下げるとあるが、同梱の取説は「20秒浸った後で３分後に」となっている。まぁ、好みなんだろうけど。可も無く不可も無し。

title: Robust & smart - fit for purpose
body: This little pot has been well used since purchasing a few weeks ago. Love that it is housed securely on a non-slip base and has a comfortable integral handle. Seems quite sturdy and is better protected from the inevitable ’clonks’ in the sink than the versions that allow you to remove the glass from the frame. Also like the extra synthetic mesh that ensures absolutely no grains whatsoever in the cup. Filled to the top it makes two good sized mugs with a little left over for small top-ups (equivalent to four to six small coffee cups).
author: Looklively
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 19 de agosto de 2023

title: Best coffee ever!
body:
Ever since I learned of the French Press to make coffee, I've never gone back to the traditional brewing.
The glass in my previous one broke which is why I bought this one to replace. Coffee has never tasted better or more fresh.
This size is perfect for one person in that it makes about 2 large cups! Highly recommend.

title: Perfekt auch für jap. Grüntee
body: Diese French Press steht der deutlich teueren bekannten Marke in nichts nach. Das Glas ist robust. Das Sieb mit extra Feinsieb dazwischen lässt sich problemlos abschrauben und reinigen. Die Kanne lässt selbst jap. Fukamushi Grüntee nicht durch das Sieb dringen. Genial. Der Tee kann frei schwimmen und ich kann sogar mehrere perfekte Aufgüsse machen. Klare Kaufempfehlung! Man sieht an dem Bild des Tees das dieser absolut klar aus der Kanne kommt. Das war der zweite Aufguss, der noch feiner ist.

date: Revisado en Alemania el 20 de abril de 2023

title: Not a good choice

title: 良きもの
body:
お試しで幾つか買った紅茶の1つの茶葉が細かくて持っている茶こしをすり抜けるものがあり、茶葉が口に残るのが嫌で購入してみました。しっかりおさえてくれてストレス無く最後まで飲めます。
珈琲も試してみましたが、珈琲は普通にドリップした方が好みでした。
300mlを選んだのも正解で愛用のマグカップにピッタリの容量、いっきに出しきって好みの濃さのところで味変せずに飲めて気に入ってます。
紅茶専用で飲むならおさえ部は流水でじゃぶじゃぶする程度で綺麗になりますし、良い買い物でした。
（耐久性の★4は使用1ヶ月なのでとりあえずの評価）

Was definitiv ein Pluspunkt ist. Hier ist Wärmeleistung aufgeführt, aber das ist bereit vorm Kauf klar, dass hier keinerlei Wärme gehalten wird. Das muss man eben vorher wisseny ob man das möchte.

title: Serves its purpose though no scoop
body:
Just finished the coffee I made after receiving this today.

The only gripe I have is that it didn’t come with a scoop as the pictures suggest.

The suggested 7g per 100ml is probably also off as I made 2 decent mugs worth which equates to 49g by their suggestion which was incredibly bitter and this is coming from someone who enjoys strong coffee.

Other than that I had no grounds in my coffee so it was nice and smooth.

title: Absolutely rubbish
body:
I purchased this as a gift in August.

The recipient only opened it this week, she opened it in front of me to ask for instructions on how to use a french press.

She took the lid off so I could show her the plunging mechanism & it literally cracked, no drop or pressure at all, just cracked, not sure how or why at this point.

Unfortunately the Amazon returns window expired and I can't seem to find a way to contact the manufacturer.

I would definitely recommend that you do not buy this 👍🏽

body: This is a lot smaller than anticipated, reading 3 cup in the description I assumed that it made 3 cups of coffee but it makes barely one. For the price I expected it to be a regular sized French Press such as any I have ever seen before in store. I would recommend going to HomeSense and buying this for $13.99 in a much larger size and different styles rather than spending $17.99 for a French Press built for a Leprechaun.

title: It is easy to operate and you will love it.
body: I’ts perfect,it can not only make coffee,but I also use it for making tea.and easy to clean.
author: Vivian
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 12 de noviembre de 2020

title: Leaky
body: This French press seems like a great design, but when you pour it, it leaks everywhere. No matter how I hold the top down or what I do, it just leaks all over everytime I pour. Disappointed.
author: Jiliah
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 7 de febrero de 2021

title: Perfect
body:
Love using my French Press every morning for that
perfect strength and taste to kick start my day.
author: Anne-Marie Ps
date: Revisado en Australia el 16 de julio de 2021

title: It works as describe.
body: Makes great coffee, easy to clean.

title: Muy bueno
body: Me encanta
author: Houda

title: Absolutely love it
body: This is so nice to have When you just want a nice cup of brewed coffee. I have an espresso machine and sometimes you just want regular ground coffee. This definitely works great. Definitely gets my coffee fix done when I need it. Easy to use and clean. Very happy with this product
author: CandiceH
date: Revisado en Canadá el 3 de agosto de 2021
